text:
@realDonaldTrump What else is rising? The demand for body bags! 

‘An internal Trump administration report expects about 200,000 daily cases by June. The White House bars coronavirus task force officials from testifying to Congress without approval.’ @NYT https://t.co/JOvtKu3YA9
